short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bring focus to your life and improve your productivity!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Bring focus to your life and improve your productivity with Assistant for Chrome!

With Assistant you can prioritize tasks and list distractions to boost your productivity. Moreover, our Hyperfocus feature enables you to truly focus on your work by blocking distracting websites while you are working.

Assistant is the simple and effective toolkit that keeps you focussed. Included in the toolkit are:

Hyperfocus
Distracting websites can eat away your time without you noticing. Block such websites for 25 minutes and improve your productivity.

Intentions
Prioritize your three most important tasks here. Just picking three tasks helps you choose what is really important.

Distractions
Small trivial tasks can occupy your mind. Write these down for later so you can focus on things that are important right now.
